name: Pesto Lasagna
author: JAMON0126
summary: Scrumptious lasagna with basil pesto, spinach and plenty of bubbly cheese.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add lasagna and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In large skillet over medium heat, saute onion in the olive oil until tender
Remove from heat and stir in the pesto
In a large bowl mix ricotta cheese, egg, salt, pepper and nutmeg
In a 3 quart greased baking dish, layer the noodles then the spinach mixture, followed by the ricotta mixture
Repeat the layers ending with noodles on top
Spread the   over the top and sprinkle with parmesan
Cover with foil and bake in a preheated oven for 45 to 55 minutes
